original_text: And yet indeed she is my sister; she is the daughter of my father, but not the daughter of my mother; and she became my wife.
korean_text: 또 그는 정말로 나의 이복 누이로서 내 아내가 되었음이니라

sentences.original_text: And yet indeed she is my sister
she is the daughter of my father
but not the daughter of my mother
